meanings.definition: Elaborate and ornate style in art and architecture characterized by intricate designs and excessive decoration.
meanings.sent1: The rococo of the palace was overwhelming with its detailed carvings and fancy decorations.
meanings.sent2: The museum displayed a beautiful rococo painting with intricate patterns and elaborate designs.
meanings.sent3: The rococo style in the garden was so fancy that even the birds seemed to admire the excessive decorations.
meanings.sent4: Her outfit was a rococo masterpiece, with layers of lace and intricate details that resembled a work of art.
meanings.sent5: The rococo architecture of the cathedral was like stepping into a fairy tale, with every corner adorned with elaborate decorations.

meanings.definition: Excessively ornate or intricate in style or design.
meanings.sent1: The rococo furniture in the room was so fancy that it almost seemed out of place in the simple house.
meanings.sent2: Her dress was rococo, with intricate lace patterns and excessive frills that caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent3: The cake was decorated in a rococo style, with so many intricate details that it looked almost too pretty to eat.
meanings.sent4: The garden was a rococo paradise, with flowers blooming in intricate patterns that seemed almost unreal.
meanings.sent5: His speech was rococo, filled with elaborate words and excessive descriptions that left everyone in awe.
